title: Journal of a tour through the Highlands of Scotland during the summer of MDCCCXXIX.
author: Botfield, Beriah
snippet: — Quitted Montrose, and deviating fromthe direct road to Aberdeen, a short way from thetown, crossed some fields to a little viUage ; and inascending a long hiil, embellished by the groves ofRosebank, enjoyed, upon looking back, a fineview of Montrose, of the German Ocean, andthe woods of Kinnalrd Castle.
